OOC: Azureblade is a triplechanger Robot-jet-dragon. His design is
movie-li=
ke (can we say G3 now?) in the sense that his dragon mode is
similar to the=
 way Scorponok looks like a scorpion.

Bic:

Undisturbed, Azureblade takes =
to the air and charges his blast in the
air so that the heat detonates the =
incoming rockets (or as many as
possible) before they get to him. In the bu=
ilding momentum, he readies
to attack the other Minion and aims his sword a=
t the other's wings.

> OOC: Are you in the form of a dragon brandishing a sword, or som=
ething
> else?
> 
> As the minions get closer, thier form become clearer. T=
hey do indeed
> resemble dragons at first: They have the wings, the tails a=
nd head, but
> only the rear legs and small front legs. (Think wyvern or dr=
ake) Like
> shadows they streak through the skies even as Azureblade's deat=
h
> dealing breath scortches one of them, sending it spinning in long
> loo=
ping circles, its armor crisping under the assault!
> 
> Agile as birds and=
 yet as domininat as lions the other two circle for a
> moment and then one=
 of them alights on the ground shifting form as he
> does so. Even as the o=
ther circles like a vulture waiting for its prey
> to fall.
> 
> In the int=
ermittent light the new commer's armor is a reflective silver
> and ebony b=
lack. Standing a few arm lengths away his stance is large
> and agressive, =
red horns rising from his helm, as black wings flare
> from his back. Sharp=
 spikes of armor extend from his shoulder plating
> as cannon mounts rest o=
n his pectoral chestplates. In one hand he
> wields a wickedly curved sword=
 nearly as large as he is a strangly
> reflective black!
> 
> "Your ammusme=
nt will fade with your life functions. You face Animus
> first blade of Vor=
pal." With a deliberate motion he points the sword at
> Azureblade even as =
his the outside calf plates of his armor open up and
> release a flurry of =
rockets at Azureblade.
>
